This vignette shows how to compute basic descriptive statistics for dates using `epi_stats_dates()`.

```{r}
library(episcout)

sample_dates <- as.Date(c(
  "2020-01-01",
  "2020-05-15",
  "2020-12-31",
  "2021-01-01",
  "2021-07-15"
))

epi_stats_dates(sample_dates)
```
